trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Cambridge
There were no other sightings in Cambridge on or around November 11th 2001
divs: Sighting Details We were at a show As You Like It at the AART whenall of a sudden in the midst of a great monologue, the magenta ship camecrashing through the control booth from behind and down into the audience. Several people must have been vaporized immediately, as no deceased werethereafter found. Could you possibly help us and share what hapopens at the endof the play, we never got to see the ending.THank you for you prompthelp.Sincerely,James Gobbs
Summary: American Repertory Theatre in Cambridge, MA Saw
